allow: Bash(python -c "from database import engine; from sqlalchemy import inspect; inspector = inspect(engine); print(''Columns in reports table:''); print([col[''name''] for col in inspector.get_columns(''reports'')])")

Bash(for service in article_group_detail_service article_group_service hop_service concept_proposal_service feature_preset_service iterative_answer_service smart_search_session_service broad_search_service extraction_service google_scholar_enrichment google_scholar_service search_service web_retrieval_service refinement_workbench_service retrieval_query_service)
Bash(cd /c/code/table-that/backend && source venv/Scripts/activate && python -c "from main import app; print\('Backend imports OK'\)" 2>&1)

Bash(cd /c/code/table-that/backend && python3 -c "
import sys
import traceback

files_to_check = [
    'routers/chat.py',
    'routers/chat_stream.py', 
    'services/chat_service.py',
    'services/chat_stream_service.py',
    'schemas/chat.py',
    'schemas/payloads.py',
    'tools/registry.py',
    'tools/builtin/__init__.py',
    'tools/builtin/table_data.py',
    'services/chat_page_config/__init__.py',
    'services/chat_page_config/registry.py',
    'services/chat_page_config/table_view.py',
    'routers/admin.py',
]

for filepath in files_to_check:
    try:
        with open\(filepath, 'r'\) as f:
            code = f.read\(\)
        compile\(code, filepath, 'exec'\)
        print\(f'✓ {filepath} - syntax OK'\)
    except SyntaxError as e:
        print\(f'✗ {filepath} - SYNTAX ERROR: {e}'\)
        traceback.print_exc\(\)
    except Exception as e:
        print\(f'✗ {filepath} - ERROR: {e}'\)
" 2>&1)

]

for filepath in files_to_check:
